Drinks

Embark on a tantalizing journey through our cocktail menu, featuring 50 unique creations meticulously crafted to awaken your senses. Indulge in the artistry of mixology and savor the exquisite flavors that will leave you craving for more.

Sours

Experience the tantalizing world of Sours, where tangy citrus meets balanced sweetness in a collection of vibrant and zesty concoctions.

  • Whiskey Sour

    Whiskey, lemon juice, simple syrup.

    $11.50

  • Margarita

    Tequila, lime juice, orange liqueur.

    $11.50

  • Pisco Sour

    Pisco, lemon juice, simple syrup, egg white.

    $12.50

  • Amaretto Sour

    Amaretto liqueur, lemon juice, simple syrup.

    Discover the perfect balance of sweet amaretto liqueur and tangy lemon in our Amaretto Sour, a delightful and velvety cocktail.

    $11.50

  • Daiquiri

    Rum, lime juice, simple syrup.

    Transport yourself to the shores of Cuba with our Daiquiri, a refreshing blend of rum, lime, and a hint of sweetness.

    $11.50

  • Tom Collins

    Gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, soda water.

    Quench your thirst with the effervescent Tom Collins, a citrusy delight that marries the tanginess of lemon with the fizz of soda water.

    $10.50

  • Sidecar

    Brandy, lemon juice, orange liqueur.

    Embark on a tropical adventure with our Mai Tai, a tantalizing mix of rum, tropical juices, and a hint of almond sweetness.

    $12.50

  • French 75

    Gin, lemon juice, simple syrup, sparkling wine.

    Elevate your evening with the sparkling sophistication of our French 75, blending gin, lemon, and effervescent bubbles.

    $13.50
